name: Scorched Sea
description:
Same as scorched earth but on sea with waves. Rules as easy as in every tank game. Target you enemy and shoot!

Developed by my humble GGJ team: Siara, Wyjec and me.

F1 - Show help screen

Left/Right Arrow - Rotate your gun
Press and hold Space - Shoot and adjust power.
Tab - Change weapon.

+/-  - Change wave pattern

F3 - Enable boat drift

F4 - Change game mode

Weapons:
Armageddon - ultimate kill weapon. Bullet explodes shooting many deadly rays from itself.
Falownik - used for terraforming. Generate wave to produce natural shield.

Global Game Jam page: https://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/scorched-sea
